original_text: In the days when the judges ruled there was a famine in the land, and a man of Bethlehem in Judah went to sojourn in the country of Moab, he and his wife and his two sons.
korean_text: 사사들이 치리하던 때에 그 땅에 흉년이 드니라 유다 베들레헴에 한 사람이 그의 아내와 두 아들을 데리고 모압 지방에 가서 거류하였는데

sentences.original_text: In the days when the judges ruled
there was a famine in the land
and a man of Bethlehem in Judah
went to sojourn in the country of Moab
he and his wife and his two sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 그의 아내와 두 아들도 함께였습니다
